# 47th Golden Bell Awards

The 47th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第47屆金鐘獎) was held on October 26, 2012 at Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by CTS.
